Lyric:
[00:04.700]Let me be your hero,
[00:07.210]
[00:13.270]Would you dance,
[00:15.700]If I asked you to dance?
[00:19.520]Would you run,
[00:22.150]And never look back?
[00:25.900]Would you cry,
[00:28.340]If you saw me crying?
[00:32.330]And would you save my soul, tonight?
[00:38.660]Would you tremble,
[00:41.030]If I touched your lips?
[00:44.980]Would you laugh?
[00:47.350]Oh please tell me this.
[00:50.780]Now would you die,
[00:53.600]For the one you love?
[00:57.410]Hold me in your arms, tonight.
[01:04.910]I can be your hero, baby.
[01:11.230]I can kiss away the pain.
[01:17.660]I will stand by you forever.
[01:23.300]You can take my breath away.
[01:32.350]Would you swear,
[01:34.780]That you'll always be mine?
[01:38.600]Or would you lie?
[01:41.230]Would you run and hide?
[01:44.160]Am I in too deep?
[01:47.160]Have I lost my mind?
[01:51.220]I don't care...
[01:52.550]You're here, tonight.
[01:58.750]I can be your hero, baby.
[02:05.060]I can kiss away the pain.
[02:11.300]I will stand by you forever.
[02:16.930]You can take my breath away.
[02:25.880]
[02:54.500]Oh, I just wanted to hold you.
[02:58.470]I just wanted to hold you.
[03:01.670]Oh yeah.
[03:02.920]Am I in too deep?
[03:06.170]Have I lost my mind?
[03:10.050]Well I don't care...
[03:11.730]You're here, tonight.
[03:17.740]I can be your hero, baby.
[03:24.070]I can kiss away the pain oh yeah
[03:30.330]I will stand by you forever.
[03:36.070]You can take my breath away.
[03:42.960]I can be your hero, baby.
[03:49.160]I can kiss away the pain.
[03:56.130]And I will stand by you, forever.
[04:03.240]You can take my breath away.
[04:09.800]You can take my breath away.
[04:15.790]I can be your hero.
